resources.string: Switching the On/Off slider would Activate/Deactivate each user\'s access to Xyntax.
Tap on the Button of the Preset you want to activate.
Select a Xyntax installation you want to connect to. You can click on the button to edit the settings of an entry.
You may also click the + button to add a new location.
You can use the Reset Xyntax button below to close and restart the Xyntax Application on your phone.
Remember that all fields are required.
This is the general help page for using Xyntax Mobile.
These are the general areas of the Xyntax Mobile App. Click on a button on the left for more detailed help.
This is the Dashboard button for Xyntax. Here you will find quick controls for the different zones and devices available in your installation.
This is the Users button for Xyntax. Here you turn on/off the access of registered users in your system.
This is the Presets button for Xyntax. You can activate any stored preset in this screen.
This is the Settings button for Xyntax. You can configure access to your Xyntax System and add other installed Xyntax Systems if you have more than one.
This is the Help button for Xyntax that links to this page.
